name: Daisy's Dragon Cafe
description:
Come down to the cafe and do some dragon-sitting!





Figure out the likes and dislikes of each dragon, give them pets, and care for them when they get sick!

WSAD - Movement
Use the mouse to
- Select food
- Pick up poop
- Heal

Credits!

Hope "Kayden" Nasr : 3d
Sarah Besserer : 2d art, UI
Liz Gravis : Audio
Aaron Oliver : UI and Audio Programming
Tyler Tomaseski: Additional Programming
Summer Tomaseki : Main Programming
For Revival Game Jam 2020


This game was started in April 2020 for a game jam and put on hold due to some family emergencies. I'm so happy we got it done for this jam. :)
